pr_title: Update CONTRIBUTING.md to recommend the right Java and Eclipse versions

timeline.message: Update CONTRIBUTING.md to recommend the right Java and Eclipse settings

timeline.bodyText: Jetty werkt nog steeds. Wel moet je nu minimaal Java 8 gebruiken omdat het Frank!Framework daarmee gecompileerd wordt..
timeline.author: nielsm5
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -25,9 +25,7 @@ After modifying a project file:
 - ctrl-c
 - cd .. ; mvn clean install ; cd example ; mvn jetty:run
 
-The jetty-maven-plugin requires Maven 3 and Java 1.7.
-
-
+In the past, it was observed that the jetty-maven-plugin required Maven 3 and Java 1.7. Presently, we work with Java 8 and Eclipse 2019-03. Working with Jetty has to be tested. At WeAreFrank!, development happens with Eclipse as is described below.

timeline.message: Jetty still works, correct previous commit
